sentence: Another opponent, Michele Woodhouse, told WRAL that Zelensky is "a hero" and said Cawthorn's comments were "boorish," per Raleigh News & Observer.
author: Brigid Kennedy
title: Cawthorn primary challengers respond after lawmaker calls Zelensky 'a thug'

sentence: tweeted Michele Woodhouse, who is challenging Cawthorn in the Republican primary.
author: David Morgan
title: Ukraine War Becomes A Cudgel In Republican Party's Internal Conflict

sentence: The 26-year-old lawmaker is facing two viable Republican challengers, state Sen. Chuck Edwards and Michele Woodhouse, former GOP chairwoman of western North Carolina's 11th Congressional District.
author: David M. Drucker
title: Rep. Madison Cawthorn holds GOP primary edge despite many unflattering headlines
